snippet.title: Sonic Superstars - Takashi Iizuka & Naoto Ohshima Interview (Extended Cut)
snippet.description:
Sonic Superstars Producer (and original designer of Sonic the Hedgehog!) Naoto Ohshima and current Sonic Team Creative Officer Takashi Iizuka talk in-depth about Sonic Superstars including inspirations, challenges, and what it's like to create a new character!

Follow us to get all the latest and greatest Sonic news:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/sonic_hedgehog
Facebook: https://facebook.com/sonic
Instagram: https://instagram.com/sonicthehedgehog
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@sonic_hedgehog
